pkgmetadata.longdescription: Coarsened Exact Matching // Implementation of the Coarsened Exact Matching algorithm discussed along with its properties in Iacus, King, Porro (2011) DOI:10.1198/jasa.2011.tm09599; Iacus, King, Porro (2012) DOI:10.1093/pan/mpr013 and Iacus, King, Porro (2019) DOI:10.1017/pan.2018.29.
